reviewText: I love all horse movies but didn't like this one as it had two different movies about different items on one disc.
movie was very good and very interesting I would order it again for a gift and would recommend it also!

We have The Black Stallion movie, along with the other 2 "movies"; and thought this would be more of the same high quality. But this is taken from the TV series, and it just isn't as good.

I would not recommend anyone spending the money on it.
